config.section.BasicConfig.name: Basic Configuration
config.DefaultFrame.name: Default Frame
config.DefaultFrame.description: Select default portrait frame to display. This will turn this mod into a portrait frame replacement.
config.DisableConditional.name: Disable Conditional
config.DisableConditional.description: Display selected 'Default Frame' without any other variation.
config.HideHeartIndicator.name: Hide Heart Indicator
config.HideHeartIndicator.description: This will hide heart level indicator that located on bottom right side of character portrait. Heart level will still appear when hovered over.
config.section.ModCompatibility.name: Mod Compatibility
config.DisableWhenGaldoranThemeActive.de: Disable this mod overlay on map that covered by Stardew Valley Expanded's Galdoran Theme.
